alert.note: Alert for Wayne (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 4:29PM EDT until June 12 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Buffalo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Wayne County in western New York... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 429 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sodus, or 16 miles east of Webster, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Williamson, Marion, Clyde, Sodus, Chimney Bluffs State Park, Rose, Huron, Savannah, Wolcott and Sodus Point. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
